OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD HEALTH AND SOCIAL CARE TRUST USER VOLUNTEER SERVICE

Desc.entry: Enables people with current or previous experience of mental health problems to use their skills and learn new ones within Sheffield Health and Social Care Trust. Placements are varied and supported by a member of staff. The aims are different for each individual but this role can be a useful way of practising for a work environment in a supportive setting. Self or any referral.
